entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
